title: Uri transform

properties.name: description
properties.value: Uri transform is an emote unlocked after completing 300 hard clue scrolls. Upon use the player transforms into Uri, opens the briefcase then teleports using a magic tablet after checking their surroundings.

content:
Uri transform
Released 6 July 2016 (Update)
Members Yes
Enhancer No
Duration 8.1 seconds
Requirements Completion of 300 hard clue scrolls
Animation

Uri transform is an emote unlocked after completing 300 hard clue scrolls. Upon use the player transforms into Uri, opens the briefcase then teleports using a magic tablet after checking their surroundings.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (hard)N/A 1Always

Note: Players will always receive the Uri transform emote on their 300th completed hard clue or their first completed hard clue after if their clue count is above 300.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The glow from the opening of the briefcase is a reference to the 1994 film Pulp Fiction.
  • You are unable to perform this emote inside the Chambers of Xeric.
  • You are unable to perform this emote on the fishing trawler.

|name = Uri transform

|update = Treasure Trail Expansion (2016)

'''Uri transform''' is an [[emote]] unlocked after completing 300 [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard clue scrolls]]. Upon use the [[Account|player]] transforms into [[Uri]], opens the [[briefcase]] then teleports using a [[magic tablet]] after checking their surroundings.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Uri transform}}

Note: Players will always receive the [[Uri transform]] emote on their 300th completed hard clue ''or'' their first completed hard clue after if their clue count is above 300.

==Trivia==
*The glow from the opening of the briefcase is a reference to the 1994 film Pulp Fiction.
*You are unable to perform this emote inside the Chambers of Xeric.
*You are unable to perform this emote on the fishing trawler.
